sentences.en: “Those teams feel that football is about scoring goals,” he said. “That is our challenge.
sentences.cn: “那些队认为足球就是得分进球”，他说，“那是我们的艰巨任务。

sentences.en: After scoring over my calmness in this graphic way he nodded wisely.
sentences.cn: 他以如此形象逼真的动作吓了我以后,便狡黠地朝我点点头.

sentences.en: Brondello secured the MVP award by scoring 357 points.
sentences.cn: 布朗德罗以357分的得分获得最有价值球员奖。

sentences.en: But even that point - scoring purpose has been adapted over time.
sentences.cn: 然而,甚至连这种意图也是经过长期不断完善才形成的.

sentences.en: Jones redeemed his earlier poor performance by scoring two goals.
sentences.cn: 琼斯射入两球方弥补其初时表现之不足.

sentences.en: Keegan made 68 appearances in two seasons for Southampton, scoring 37 times.
sentences.cn: 基冈为南安普敦队踢了两个赛季，共上场68次，进球37个。

sentences.en: Lampard got in on the scoring act after 30 minutes.
sentences.cn: 兰帕德在第三十分钟破门得分.

sentences.en: Not solely a scoring machine, Michael dominates defensively as well.
sentences.cn: 不仅是得分机器, 迈克尔还控制防守.

sentences.en: Our team turned the tables in the last five minutes by scoring two goals successively.
sentences.cn: 我队在最后五分钟内连进两球,反败为胜.

sentences.en: Riyadh is not the place for scoring dramatic breakthroughs.
sentences.cn: 利雅得根本就不是可以取得引人注目的突破的地方.

sentences.en: Score lightly at first and then repeat, scoring deeper each time until the board is cut through.
sentences.cn: 先轻轻地划一道痕，然后再反复划，每次划得深一点，直到木板被割断。

sentences.en: The key for us is to start scoring goals.
sentences.cn: 我们的关键是要取得进球.

sentences.en: The politicians might be forced to touch on the real issues rather than scoring points off each other.
sentences.cn: 政客们可能会被迫讨论真正的问题而不只是互相抬杠。

sentences.en: The Rockets rely on him for more that scoring and playmaking.
sentences.cn: 火箭依靠他得分和策动进攻.

sentences.en: The striker was unable to find his scoring touch.
sentences.cn: 那个前锋找不到进球的感觉。

sentences.en: This allows a modeler to see all of the gathered metrics for that element and decide whether it is just one metric that is problematic or whether that element is scoring badly in several ways.
sentences.cn: 这样还允许模型构建者为这个元素查看搜集的所有矩阵，从而确定它仅仅是一个有问题的矩阵或者这个元素是否在几个方面得分都很不理想。

sentences.en: To surpass ( an opponent ) in skill or technique or in scoring points.
sentences.cn: 比赛技巧胜于,击败在技艺、技能或在得分上超过 ( 对手 )

words.tran_cn: （竞赛等的）记分员；记录员；得分者；刻划痕迹的人
获得；评价；划线，刻划；把…记下

trans.tran_en: the act or practice of scoring
